articles.title: Intel launches Core Ultra Series 3 CPUs, made using its long-awaited 18A process - Ars Technica

articles.title: Nvidia unveils 'reasoning' AI technology for self-driving cars - BBC

articles.content:
Lily JamaliNorth America Technology correspondent
Nvidia boss Jensen Huang on Monday announced Alpamayo, a tech platform the company says will help self-driving cars think like humans.
